posts.post_content:
Offered here are two S74-2 colored silks. One is Oldring with a tough bronze color. The Other Kid Elberfeld with green colored fabric. Both have red ink and are both Old Mills. 
Oldring is nice with some fraying bottom right border 
Elberfeld is a solid silk with nice borders and minimal faying and just some minimal aging . Elberfeld has the nice cross bat design with the glove and catcher's mask present at the bottom
 
Oldring 75.00
Elberfeld 115.00
Meyers sold 

  Net prices. please add 5.99 for shipping with tracking
